name: Ritual Seasons
description:
Cooperative game in which the Nymah, guardians of the forest, have to do the ritual of the change of seasons through the soul of the sleeping forest, which is sleeping in the sacred tree. To achieve this, they have to step at the same time on the panels of their own colors, completing this way the ritual that will change winter into spring. Help the Nymah complete their mission!

DOWNLOAD THE GAME AND VOTE FOR IT IN THE GLOBAL GAME JAM 2016 HERE!!!
